class bz_public.ExtEncoder(skipkeys=False, ensure_ascii=True, check_circular=True, allow_nan=True, sort_keys=False, indent=None, separators=None, encoding='utf-8', default=None)[source]¶

Bases: json.encoder.JSONEncoder

default(o)[source]¶
class bz_public.Storage[source]¶

Bases: dict

Storage 就是把 python 的字典的 get set 方法 override 了 这样用起来比较方便

>>> o = storage(a=1)
>>> o.a
1
>>> o['a']
1
>>> o.a = 2
>>> o['a']
2
>>> del o.a
>>> o.a
Traceback (most recent call last):
    ...
AttributeError: 'a'
